snippet.title: Wii-U Costume Quest 2 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Costume Quest 2 is the sequel to the Halloween hit Costume Quest and features all the humor, style and fun of the original with all new outfits, a brand new story and time travel! 

Learn more at www.CostumeQuest2.com 

Team up with costumed twins Wren and Reynold as they set out to save October’s most hallowed day from Dr. Orel White, a misunderstood dentist dedicated to a world free of cavities, candy and Halloween.

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/Midnight_City

Like us on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/midnightcitygames
